description: Fired when a component is successfully added to or updated on an entity instance. This includes both adding new components and changing the data of existing ones.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:component_added' event payload.

entity.description: The full entity instance that received the component.

componentTypeId.description: The ID of the component that was added or updated.

componentData.description: The validated data of the added/updated component. Will be 'null' if the component was explicitly set to null, or an object otherwise.

oldComponentData.description: Optional. The data of the component before this change. Is undefined if the component was not present before.
